title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the expected behavior is that the Team entry should be present in the context menu, but it is not.
OB: When opening the context menu to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the Team entry is not available.
EB: The expected behavior is that the Team entry should appear in the context menu when selecting a .java file and another resource.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer. 2. Open the context menu and observe that the Team entry is missing.
